title: Warlords III: Darklords Rising for PC
creator_credit: Strategic Studies Group and Red Orb Entertainment
material_description: CD-ROM videogame. CD-ROM, CD jewel case, advert, registration card, troubleshooting guide and manual in cardboard box
brief_description: A stand-alone expansion to Warlords III: Reign of Heroes, Warlords III: Darklords Rising adds new campaigns and scenarios, an enhanced random map generator, and more heroes, units, and spells. Gameplay has also been changed to allow for simultaneous movements, a first in the series.
creator_credit_for_label: Strategic Studies Group and Red Orb Entertainment
